title: Cute Hairstyle
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Kasumi-chan, your hairdo is cute.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah, the way you braid it really suits you. The ribbon you used is cute and matches you perfectly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ahh, Kasumin loves you Kanan-senpai~! It totally paid off for Kasumin to wake up early and do her hair~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I always thought you were great at styling hair. I’m not really good at that kind of thing, so I’m always impressed.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin will do something for you then, Kanan-senpai! A ponytail is solid, but if we change up your hairstyle, you’ll be able to radiate a new level of cuteness! Your hair is already long and beautiful, so once Kasumin is done working on it, you’ll definitely look even cuter!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Okay, Kasumi-chan, could you do my hair for me, please?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Of course! Kasumin is going to transform Kanan-senpai into an even cuter girl!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Thanks. I can’t wait to see what you’re gonna do. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Just leave it to Kasumin! Sit down here, Kanan-senpai. Kasumin is going to cast a spell of extreme cuteness on you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
